long_description:
# Milk potion

This mod adds a splash milk potion, i.e., a potion you can throw that removes effects.

![](https://content.luanti.org/thumbnails/2/09415069e0.webp)

## Using
This depends on Mineclonia > 0.115.0 because of [pr#3472](https://codeberg.org/mineclonia/mineclonia/pulls/3472).

In-game, you can craft soothing potions (milk bottles), or brew a bucket of milk into empty bottles, to get soothing potion. Then you can brew with gunpowder to get a splash soothing potion, and then with dragon breath to get a lingering soothing potion.

![](/uploads/717441c2a0.png)

You can also craft a bucket of chocolate milk, which removes effects and also gives you a tiny bit of food.
